channel.title: I need help making my client connect to my server automatically
channel.description:
I want Butter client to be able to connect to my server without revealing the information. I want it to only give you the option to put in a username and a password. I also want ti to connect automatically just without showing the IP and port.
if you have another client that I can use for this, I'd appreciate it. Thanks to whoever can help.

I need that too…
